video_prompt: Female android slowly raises hand to chest, then extends it forward, golden sparks rising around her. Her hair subtly sways. Distant city lights shimmer; blurred cars move.
image_prompt: lifelike female android in glowing white and pearlescent futuristic swimsuit with golden accents and intricate details, dark eyes, long black high ponytail, gold drop earrings, iridescent panels, visible circuits, exposed gold wiring, delicate pose with sparks, on a bustling city street at night, soft glow of streetlights, neon signs, blurred people in background. Vertical full shot.
refined_video_prompt: A female android's hand slowly ascends to her chest, then projects forward. Golden sparks ignite, drifting upwards around her. The android's hair gently oscillates. Distant city lights softly pulse and glow, as blurred vehicles streak past.
